oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Control of Adoxophyes orana F.v.R. with entomopathogens and NeemAzal-T/S: first approach for optimal combination strategies
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kumpmann, S.
Kienzle, J.
Schulz, C.
Zebitz, C.P.w.
Trapp, A.
Kelderer, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Fruit and berries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The application 01 NeemAzal-T/S, a product based on Neem extracts and plant oil, lor aphid contro I in apple orchards shows promising side effects on Adoxophyes orana. However, the efficacy 01 the recommended dosage 01 3 Vha at red bud stage is not enough lor a satisfying control 01 A. orana orchards with medium and high pest pressure. Field trials were carried out to introduce these side ellects in combination strategies with Bacillus thuringiensis or CA. PEX 2 (Granulovirus) lor ellicient control 01 this pesI.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kumpmann, S.; Kienzle, J.; Schulz, C.; Zebitz, C.P.w.; Trapp, A. and Kelderer, M. (2002) Control of Adoxophyes orana F.v.R. with entomopathogens and NeemAzal-T/S: first approach for optimal combination strategies. In: Boos, Markus (Ed.) Ecofruit - 10th International Conference on Cultivation Technique and Phytopathological Problems in Organic Fruit-Growing: Proceedings to the Conference from 31st January to 2nd February 2006 at Weinsberg/Germany, pp. 35-42.
